```{r global}
library(mrgsolve)
library(dplyr)
library(shiny)
mod <- mrgsolve:::house()

```

# Example {.sidebar}
```{r}
library(shiny)
# Title: My Plot
# CL 0.2-2 by 0.2 start: 1
# VC 5-50 by 20 start: 5
# Select: linetype solid, dashed, dotted
# Select: dose 100 to 1000 by 100 start: 300
# Select: date
# Go button

sim <- reactive({
  mod %>%
    data_set(data()) %>%
    param(CL = 1, VC = 20) %>% 
    mrgsim(digits=3)
 
})

data <- reactive({
  expand.ev(amt=100, ii=24, addl=2)
})
```

# Server Tab 1

## Column 1

### Plot one

```{r}
renderPlot({

  plot(sim(),
       CP~.,
       main="My Plot",
       lty=1,
       xlab="Go / date")
})
```

### Table one

```{r}
renderTable({
  return(head(mrgsolve::as.data.frame(sim())))
})
```
